page.title: 08SOUTHWAY SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: 90% live locally. 66% walk to the shops,28% drive, 6% come by bus 64% shop more than once a week,16% once a week,20% less. 52% think prices are dearer than in Plymouth. 4%think they are cheaper . 68% think the quality is the same, 20% think it is worse. 38% use the libary often.44% sometimes, 18% never. 58%intend to shop at new Tesco when it opens. Most people think the bus service is good. Most people think the car park is good but gets crowded sometimes. 72% shop here because it's close to home, 10% because they work nearby, 6% because it is near the doctor, 2% because it is near the post office,and10% because of the quality.
